'''Porthos''' is an [[NPC]] located in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]]. He guards the entrance of the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]] alongside [[Athos]].

===Appearance===
Porthos wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt and horse riding pants with white plate armor worn on top. However, the poleyns, greaves, and sabatons are black. The Knights of Favonius crest decorates the breastplate.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Porthos:''' ...Welcome!
:{{DIcon}} What is this place?
::'''Porthos:''' The Knights of Favonius Headquarters... You don't look like a troublemaker, so you can go in.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Porthos:''' Best wishes to you.
{{Dialogue end}}

==Trivia==
* He was named after one of the ''{{w|The Three Musketeers}}.'' The other characters who follow this naming convention are [[Aramis]] and [[Athos]].
